text.textblock: Pursuant to the United States-Canada Free Trade Agreement
Request For An Extraordinary Challenge Committee
Pursuant to Article 1904 of the Canada-United States Free Trade Agreement, (
) hereby requests an Extraordinary Challenge Committee review of the panel decision referenced below. The following information is provided pursuant to rules 39 and 40 of the
(The name of the Party filing this Request)
(The name of counsel for the Party)
(The service address, as defined by Rule 4 of the
(The telephone number of counsel for the Party)
(The title of the panel review for which an Extraordinary Challenge Committee is requested)

6. Concise statement of the allegations relied on, together with a concise statement of how the actions alleged have materially affected the panel's decision and the way in which the integrity of the panel review process is threatened.
7. Items of the record of the panel review relevant to the allegations contained in the Request, and an Index of the items are attached (see rule 40(1)).
8. Where a Request contains an allegation referred to in Article 1904.13(a)(i) of the Agreement
(a) confidential annex is attached containing the identity of the panelist against whom such an allegation is made (
(b) items of the record of the panel review relevant to the allegations contained in the Request, and an Index of the items are attached (
(c) any other material relevant to the allegations contained in the Request is attached (
(d) if the Request is filed more than 30 days after the panel issued a Notice of Final Panel Action pursuant to rule 79A of the
an affidavit certifying that the Party gained knowledge of the action of the panelist giving rise to the allegation no more than 30 days preceding the filing of the Request (
9. Where the Panel Decision Was Made in Canada:
(a) I intend to use the specified language in pleadings and oral proceedings (Specify one)
(b) I request simultaneous translation of oral proceedings (Specify one)
